Test Name: Postmortem Screening: Bile and Blood Spot Analysis
Purpose: Analytical examination of bile and dried blood spot samples collected during postmortem examinations to obtain accurate and reliable biochemical findings.
Container: Sterile container for bile; specialized filter paper cards (e.g., Guthrie cards) for blood spots
Equipment: Spectrophotometer or HPLC for bile analysis; LC-MS/MS (or equivalent) for blood spot analysis
